title: People Are Losing Their Accounts Due To Them Clicking and Signing In.
body: Multiple of my friends have been falling for this trick and this person is taking the accounts and spreading the link to people of their friends list.

replies.body: Sounds like someone is making the rounds with [**Phishing Websites**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204230720) again =\ . These pages are designed to look like the official League pages, but the easiest way to spot them is by knowing that Riot doesn't generally give out large amounts of RP for free, and we're never going to ask for your username or password.
